data.name: HITMAN 3 - Trinity Pack
data.detailed_description: The Trinity Pack includes new items that can be used in HITMAN 3. Each item is themed to represent a game from the World of Assassination trilogy.
data.about_the_game: The Trinity Pack includes new items that can be used in HITMAN 3. Each item is themed to represent a game from the World of Assassination trilogy.
data.short_description: The Trinity Pack includes new items that can be used in HITMAN 3. Each item is themed to represent a game from the World of Assassination trilogy.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS 64-bit Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon HD 7870
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 4790 4 GHz
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD GPU Radeon RX Vega 56 8GB
